# VEHICLE::SWING_BOAT_BOOM_FREELY

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** swingFreely

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Allow the boat boom to swing freely

Same call as ALLOW_BOAT_BOOM_TO_ANIMATE
